page.title: 19ANOTHER DAY
page.content: In the mornings I would get up at 7:30.For breakfast I will have cerals.I go to School by car driven by Mum.School starts at 9 o'clock.On a holiday morning I will have a big argument with my brother.A day off would mean just sandwiches for lunch.But if we were at School boring old sandwiches,drink and an apple again.You can't sunbathe with Sultan (our cat) because he bites your nose.Boiling eggs is easy.Just wait for the eggs to boil then put the toast down,when it pops the eggs are ready.My Dad will normally come home from 5 o'clock till 8:30.He is a director at a car firm.In the day at home the television is normally an answer,playing or having friends over.When I have friends over my litle sister always gets in our way.Mum has to keep the peace.
